channel.title: Vps
channel.description: Hi I am new to this hosting stuff and my internet and router does not allow portforwarding. Does anyone know where I can try a 7 days - 1 month free trial vps?

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Rule number 1

  1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.
